column4: sorry for the strange question but.. how do you translate "image resolution" in spanish?
I'm using an amd64 desktop, and powernowd is working fine for me ..my 2.2GHz CPU is almost constantly at 1GHz
Access to /proc/cpufreq is deprecated and will be removed from (new) 2.6. kernels soon after 2005-01-01
until kernel update it was working...
do a sudo apt-get install powernowd
do a dmesg |grep proc ...does it mention powernow in there?
when you save a file, have you tried pressing CTRL+R?
I filed a bug for the scaling problem
and someone else added the same problem for k8 arch
